Documentation.long_help: Reads LFRic data from a netCDF file in UGRID format.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the netCDF file name for the LFRic reader.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimestepValues
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable animations with time steps if available in the input file.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseIndexAsVerticalCoordinate
IntVectorProperty.label: Use index as vertical coordinate
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Use level index as vertical coordinate instead of actual height coordinates.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseCartesianCoordinates
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Cartesian coordinates
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Convert longitude-latitude-radius coordinates to Cartesian coordinates.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: VerticalScale
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Vertical Scale
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This scale factor will be applied to the vertical coordinate "rad", r = scale*(rad+bias).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: VerticalBias
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Vertical Bias
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This bias will be added to the vertical coordinate "rad", r = scale*(rad+bias).

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: List of fields (cell arrays) in the LFRic input file.
